package.name: Python3
package.build:
export CC="gcc" export CXX="g++" jobcount=4 cd Python-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi
case $(uname -m) in x86_64) export CFLAGS="-fPIC" ;; esac ./configure --prefix=/usr \ --enable-shared \ --with-system-expat \ --with-system-ffi \ --without-ensurepip make -j $jobcount
